reviews.review: Portal 2 is a fun puzzle game that greatly improves on the first hit puzzle game from Valve. Portal 2 adds in so many more diverse and mind-boggling puzzles that are so much fun to solve whilst also being impossible at times, and then some are so easy that they make you laugh at them. The game is also incredibly funny, with a darker sense of humour that works so well with the tone of this game. The co-op mode is also a really fun mode that will grant you an amazing time.
